welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rockledge, a charming city known for its picturesque parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Merritt Island Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melbourne International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Melbourne International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
